mapper.select:
select YEAR as Year, MONTH as Month, ZROWID as ZROWID, VALUE01 as VALUE01, VALUE02 as VALUE02
from ET_PROFIT_REP WHERE YEAR = #{Year} and MONTH = #{Month}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ET_PROFIT_REP ( YEAR, MONTH, ZROWID, VALUE01, VALUE02
) VALUES ( #{Year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zrowid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{value01,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value02,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ET_PROFIT_REP SET VALUE01=#{value01,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , VALUE02=#{value02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
WHERE YEAR = #{Year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MONTH = #{Month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZROWID= #{zrowid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select * from ET_PROFIT_REP WHERE YEAR = #{Year} and MONTH = #{Month}
select YEAR as Year, MONTH as Month, ZROWID as ZROWID, VALUE01 as VALUE01, VALUE02 as VALUE02 from ET_PROFIT_REP WHERE YEAR = #{Year}
